course.subject: CIVL
course.name: Water Resources Systems Analysis
course.description: Systems approach to the area of water resources management; includes water resources systems within the context of public investment systems, criteria and design of water management schemes.

reviews.author: tanzi
reviews.title: CIVL 5520 Work load is heavy
reviews.comment_content:
Much content is about optimization, but not common math optimization, so you can find few references.

The questions are hard.
Almost the solution is special optimization in Water Resources field.
reviews.comment_teaching:
The teaching is Okay. But, I cannot follow, anyway.

The lecturer has a little accent, but fine as I have recordings.
reviews.comment_grading:
not high. It's hard to get a grade better than B+.

I have 4 labmates attending this course. Two B, one B- and one B+.
reviews.comment_workload:
The workload is super heavy. There are 4 assignments in total.

Every assignment requires programming, 2 whole days at least.
